definition: Bamboo Annals, early chronicle of Chinese ancient history, written c. 300 BC

sentences.english: In the lunar calendar, the years are designated by the Heavenly Stems and Earthly Branches.
It was the first time that a large steel incense burner made by marquis tang government office with inscriptions were found in nanyang.
sentences.chinese: 南阳首次发现有铭文纪年和唐王府铸造的大型铁香炉。

sentences.english: The Chinese animal signs are a 12-year cycle used for dating the years.
sentences.chinese: 十二属相就是用来纪年的一个十二年的循环。

sentences.english: Nevertheless, when did the way of numbering the years with Gan-Zhi start, different people have different versions.
sentences.chinese: 但，从什么时候开始以干支来纪年却有不同说法。

sentences.english: The Bane of Kree was a barbarian conqueror who lived during the Age of Legends.
sentences.chinese: 克里之灾是生活在传奇纪年的一个野蛮的征服者。

sentences.english: In contemporary, New Year's day, refers to the Christian era at the first day.
sentences.chinese: 在当代，元旦指公元纪年的岁首第一天。

sentences.english: Guyu Following the Yellow Emperor of the industry, when the Yellow Emperor was born to reign for personal use only.
sentences.chinese: 故欲继黄帝之业，当自用黄帝降生为纪年始。

sentences.english: Ancient Chinese people invented the method to designate the years by the Heavenly Stems and Earthly Branches.
sentences.chinese: 中国古人发明了用“干支”纪年的方法。

definition: reign title/era name (name for either the entire reign of an emperor or one part of it)/year number (such as 2016 or 甲子)
official name of a nation (includes dynastic names of China: 漢|汉[Han4], 唐[Tang2] etc)
variant of 曆法|历法 calendar
to read and interpret ancient texts/to decipher
to cast (pour metal into a mold)
oracle script/oracle bone character (an early form of Chinese script)
to change an emperor's or ruler's reign title (old)
